name: m0rpheus
description: A service for downloading Deezer, Spotify and Tidal music (or album) to your Onedrive.

M0RPHEUS_ACCESS_KEY.description: A password like secret key for verifying authorization to prevent spam.

IFTTT_WEBHOOK_KEY.description: Key acquired from https://ifttt.com/maker_webhooks documentation page. Needed for pushing error events to /push trigger on IFTTT Webhook.

ARL.description: ARL cookie value from a signed in Deezer account: https://notabug.org/RemixDev/deemix/wiki/Getting+your+own+ARL
